Docs.summary: Represents information for a managed folder.

.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> CanDelete
Public ReadOnly Property CanDelete As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> CanDelete { Nullable<bool> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user can delete objects in the folder.
Docs.value: true if the objects in the folder can be deleted; otherwise, false.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user can rename or move objects in the folder.
Docs.value: true if the objects in the folder can be renamed or moved; otherwise, false.
